name: Oceanid
desc:
A life-form created from condensed Hydro elements of incredible purity. Often attached to bodies of water.
It is said that as water bodies become purer, the Hydro elements within grow more abundant, causing the Oceanids to grow more powerful. It is also said by some that Oceanids were once sea creatures from a home far away who carried the fragments of a long-dead god to the many corners of this world. Perhaps they did this so that the love their god held for this world could be spread through the waters to all the land...

dropMaterial.name: Mora
dropMaterial.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

dropMaterial.name: Cleansing Heart
dropMaterial.desc:
A palmful of eternal water left by an oceanid.
Though it has already diffused among the depths of the lake, its purity remains all the same. But why would a creature so pure and clean as an oceanid covet the appearance of a being that roams the land, and assume such a form with pure water? They need not breathe nor do they require sustenance...

dropMaterial.name: Varunada Lazurite Fragment
dropMaterial.desc:
Character Ascension material.
"My ideals have no stains."

dropMaterial.name: Varunada Lazurite Chunk
dropMaterial.desc:
Character Ascension material.
"My ideals have no stains.
I must correct you. People here bear no sins in the eyes of the gods..."

dropMaterial.name: Varunada Lazurite Gemstone
dropMaterial.desc:
Character Ascension material.
"My ideals have no stains.
I must correct you. People here bear no sins in the eyes of the gods... Only laws and the Tribunal can judge someone.
They can judge even me. So praise my magnificence and purity."

value.name: Rhodeia of Loch
value.desc:
"Lady of Clear Waters" Rhodeia

"As long as rain falls and rivers flow… water will exist forever…"

customize.text: A noble elemental lifeform that dwells within bodies of pure water. In combat, it will expend and condense its life force into Hydro Mimics that attack its enemies. Although they are all aligned with Hydro, <color=#ffe14b>different elements that react with Hydro</color> are effective against different Hydro Mimics. Defeat these Mimics rapidly to overcome the Oceanid with ease.

<color=#ffd780>Hydro Hunter</color>
Defeat every type of Hydro Mimic that an Oceanid can summon.

customize.name: Primogem
customize.desc: A primordial crystalline gem that's beyond the mundane world. Shines with the condensed hopes and dreams of universes that once were.

customize.text:
<color=#ffd780>Dip, Duck, Dive, Dodge, Defeat</color>
Defeat an Oceanid without being hit by water bombs left behind by certain Hydro Mimics.

customize.name: Primogem
customize.desc: A primordial crystalline gem that's beyond the mundane world. Shines with the condensed hopes and dreams of universes that once were.

customize.text:
<color=#ffd780>A Fish Called Rhodeia</color>
Defeat an Oceanid in Co-Op Mode.
